Question
========
  
An experiment examines whether students with a kind test tutor finish a test faster (measured in minutes) than students with a strict test tutor. For this purpose, two equally sized groups are randomly selected. The best-fit analysis to analyze this data is.

  
Answerlist
----------
* T-test for two independent groups
* Mann-Whitney test
* Wilcoxon test
* Pearson's correlation
